duties_responsibilities.duty: Installation, maintenance, and troubleshooting of machinery and equipment with a focus on preventive measures.
Identifying and rectifying issues, adjusting parts, and controlling downtime.
Collaborative efforts within the team to ensure a safe working environment and achieve positive outcomes.
Travel for repairs and installations, as well as close coordination with the Area Team for significant projects and technology implementations.
Ability to work independently or as part of a team, emphasizing meticulous maintenance of tools and completion of necessary paperwork.
Regular weekly travel to diverse sites for tunnel repairs and equipment installations within the regional area, occasional overnight stays possible.

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma or Equivalent required. 2+ years of carwash management experience
